headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in General Mills After a 27% Share Price Slide?
summary: If you have been wondering whether General Mills is quietly turning into a value play or a value trap, you are not alone. This article is going to walk through that question step by step. With the stock down 27.7% year to date and 27.5% over the last 12 months, the market has clearly marked it down, raising the possibility of both bargain territory and a sign of deeper concerns. Recent headlines have focused on shifting consumer preferences toward private label and healthier options, as well...
